head.title: Amy Pietz's Super Bowl Chicken Fingers

ing.item: Envelope chicken seasoning with roasting bag
Boneless skinless chicken breasts; ub 1/2" strips

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 350 Â°. Arrange cooking bag in a 13x9" baking pan. Place strips of chicken in bag. Combine seasoning, mustard, honey and vinegar. Pour over chicken. Close bag and tie loosely with tie included in package. Cut four small holes in top of bag to allow steam to escape. Bake for 35 minutes. Remove from oven; let stand for 5 minutes. Move chicken from bag to platter; skewer each strip with a toothpick. Serves 4-6 as an hors d'oeurve. MC formatting by bobbi744@sojourn.com
Serving Ideas : Serve with hot sauce and blue cheese.
NOTES : Amy Pietz plays Annie Spadaro on NBC's sitcom, Caroline in the City.
Recipe by: TV Guide, January 25' 97
Posted to MC-Recipe Digest by Roberta Banghart <bobbi744@sojourn.com> on Apr 13, 1998
